cast.overview: Pakistan-born comedian Kumail Nanjiani and grad student Emily Gardner fall in love but struggle as their cultures clash. When Emily contracts a mysterious illness, Kumail finds himself forced to face her feisty parents, his family's expectations, and his true feelings.
cast.title: The Big Sick

details.biography:
Kuhoo Verma is an actress known for Murder Mystery 2 (2023), Plan B (2021), and The Big Sick (2017).

She appeared off-Broadway in Fairycakes and Octet.
details.name: Kuhoo Verma
details.place_of_birth: New York City, New York, USA
